body.name: Tide PODS Laundry Detergent Soap Pods, Spring Meadow Scent, 112 count

climatePledgeFriendly.details: GreenCircle Certified: Certified Energy Savings verifies product energy savings of over 10% in the use-phase compared to similar products.

features: Works on 100% of common stains, even in cold water.
A 3-in-1 clean, with concentrated detergent, stain removers, and color protectors.
America's #1 trusted detergent.* *Consumers’ #1 Trusted laundry detergent brand in Reader’s Digest survey
body.description: Face it, the world can be a really dirty place. Coffee mugs get jostled, flowerbeds get weeded, and home plates get slidden into. In a world where common stains can be mere moments away, you need a clean that can stand up to 100% of them. You need Tide 3-in-1 PODS Spring Meadow. By combining concentrated detergents, powerful stain removers and color protectors into one convenient laundry pac, Tide 3-in-1 PODS give you the Tide detergent clean you need with the ease of drop-in-and-done. Along with the refreshing, invigorating scent of Spring Meadow. But the news gets even better. Tide 3-in-1 PODS work in any machine, whether you normally use an HE detergent or not, and are designed to dissolve even in cold water. Just place a Tide PODS in the washing machine drum before adding clothing, and you’re good to go. That's not only good for your sense of clean, its also good for your energy bill. Which means it's also good for the planet, and your wallet. Get the clean of Tide laundry detergent with the convenience and confidence of Tide laundry detergent PODS in every load, every time, for every family.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Save 90% of energy on every load on average just by switching from hot to cold. *When using a non-HE machine and switching all loads from hot to cold water, based on average electricity rate of (US, 13.3c/kWh) and 8 loads per week. Specially formulated for cold water conditions to keep clothing looking colorful and bright.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Laundry Perfection in a Pod
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Tide PODS Liquid Laundry Detergent pacs in Spring Meadow Scent have revolutionized the way I do laundry, and I can't help but give them a well-deserved 5-star rating!First and foremost, these pods are incredibly convenient. No more measuring out messy liquid or powder detergent; you simply toss one of these pods into the washing machine, and you're good to go. It's the ultimate laundry hack for anyone looking to simplify their routine.Now, let's talk performance. These Tide PODS mean business! They tackle stains and dirt with remarkable efficiency, leaving my clothes looking fresh and clean after every wash. Whether it's a load of heavily soiled jeans or delicate fabrics, these pods deliver consistent, outstanding results.The Spring Meadow scent is an absolute delight. Not only do these pods clean your laundry, but they also infuse it with a refreshing and long-lasting fragrance that makes your clothes smell as if they've just been plucked from a meadow. It's like a breath of fresh air every time I open the washing machine.Another thing I appreciate is that these pods work well in both standard and high-efficiency washing machines, providing versatility that suits everyone's needs.Furthermore, the large 112-count package ensures that I'm well-stocked for a good while, and it offers great value for the quality of detergent you receive.In summary, Tide PODS Liquid Laundry Detergent pacs in Spring Meadow Scent are a laundry game-changer. They make washing clothes a breeze, provide exceptional cleaning power, and leave your laundry smelling fantastic. If you want laundry perfection without the hassle, look no further. These pods deserve every bit of their 5-star rating!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Spring Meadow Scent!
reviews.reviewText: Tide PODS are my favorite! The PODS are easy to use & clean my clothes fabulously! The spring meadow scent smells wonderful! I mostly wash large loads of clothes & 3 PODS does the trick. I toss them in the washer evenly spread & they work their magic. I’ve never had one open & leave cleaner on any of my clothes. They dissolve nicely in my the washer. The container they come in is designed where they are easy to grab & the top locks into place for security. The price for 112 PODS on Amazon utilizing subscribe & save is unbeatable. I do recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent and lasts forever
reviews.reviewText: These are awesome, I wont use anything else on my laundry! They’re perfectly portioned so that your machine doesn’t get overloaded with soap, they clean the clothes very nicely, and they come out smelling great. I bought one of these packs and it contained enough pods for two people’s laundry for like at least 6 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and simple
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been buying this for almost 10 years and I love it. I don’t have a washer machine at home and I’m not trying to carry 2-3 bottles to and from the laundromat even though I drive. This one has more than just detergent in it so it’s all in one. Smells good. No need to put too many of them. I put 2 for almost a full bag of laundry and 1 for some towels( I do use oxy with it too though). I like the simpleness of it the most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Arrived on time and looks great!
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this product because I forgot to get them from Sam’s Club when I went earlier in the day so I decided to get them from Amazon, good price and got here the next day which is amazing! And it looks so good on my laundry shelf and is now friends with all my other cleaning products :) would definitely order again if the price stays the same!

reviews.reviewerName: Our family is allergic to scented. Need to cancel this order and all future orders. Allergic to the scented. Thank you.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tide pods. Get clothes clean. Love this product.
reviews.reviewText: Love the scent and cleanliness. Love these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Jerry, the best
reviews.reviewText: These Tide Pods are just great. I tried the Persil variety and they also worked well, these Tide Pods just work a little better. This is a top tier product. If the price was cheaper I would imagine that everyone would be using Tide Pods. Exceptional cleaning with a nice mellow scent. Available in a myriad of scents and combinations. So easy to use, just toss one in, no measuring or wasted soap by using too much. Just a great product all around. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars IT CLEANS MY CLOTHES VERY WELL
reviews.reviewText: I usually buy the tide liquid but decided to give the tide pods a try and these are splendid!! Saving more detergent and money!

reviews.reviewTitle: Tide PODS - A Burst of Freshness for Every Wash!
reviews.reviewText: Tide PODS Liquid Laundry Detergent pacs in the Spring Meadow Scent have revolutionized my laundry routine. With 112 convenient pods per pack, each wash is a burst of freshness. The Spring Meadow fragrance is invigorating, leaving clothes smelling wonderfully clean. The pod design is a game-changer – no mess, no measuring, just pop one in, and you're good to go. These pods dissolve completely, leaving no residue on clothes. They tackle tough stains with ease, ensuring a thorough and effective clean every time. Tide PODS have simplified laundry day for me, making it not just a chore, but a refreshing and satisfying experience. Highly recommended for laundry that feels and smells amazing!
Ich habe in der USA, benutze, riech sehr gut und die Wasche auch.

reviews.reviewText: We just love using Tide, it cleans great and smells great
